titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Patricia Pierce, Dean of Academic Life, Yale College, Records
Pierce (Patricia), Dean of Academic Life, Yale College, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:50

did.unittitle: Patricia Pierce, dean of academic life, Yale College, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of office files dean of academic life at Yale College documenting students, teaching fellows, committees, disciplinary actions, and the Women's Studies Program of Yale College.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-B (YRG 9-B), Records of deputy, associate, and assistant deans of Yale College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Patricia Pierce, Dean of Academic Life, Yale College, Records (RU 579). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of office files dean of academic life at Yale College documenting students, teaching fellows, committees, disciplinary actions, and the Women's Studies Program of Yale College.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by subject.

did.unittitle: Records of Patricia Pierce as dean of academic life
National Endowment for the Humanities Grant material
